snippet.title: Turn-based football? How is that possible?
snippet.description:
Many football fans asked how can you turn football into a turn-based video game?

Creoteam game designer Andrey Kostyushko explains how he came up with the idea and how his team tried to express the drama of football through turn-based mechanics. 

He also describes the challenges that arose during development and what lies at the heart of the game's core concept.

Follow on Steam (demo available) - https://store.steampowered.com/app/375530
